Name: Dotting Mother
Text: Oh, a Voodoo doll! How perfect! And don't you worry a hair on your head hun, I know enough about these things to make sure this little rascal won't accidently go using it on people. Tootles <3!

Name: Tired Witch
Text: ...How... Do you know...? ([i]I need to be careful around her...[/i])
